extraction_notes: Lines 200-500 contain identical site-wide news content as all other pages. This is an informational page about team members/makers. No bilingual equivalent identified in navigation. Differentiation through hero background and team-specific images. Listed in main navigation as 'tegijad' (makers/creators).
